about_the_game:
"Heterodoxy." is an adventure game, you need to control the two characters "Ye" and "Ying" in the game to retrieve the memories, explore the truth of the research institute events, and try to get everything back on track.

Have a rich plot (probably...)
As you work towards your ultimate goal, there are other events waiting for you to explore.

There is good original music (perhaps?)
There are indeed original music, but as to whether it sounds good or not... I can only tell you that the author has played FL Studio for a year. Yes, you read that right. It was not a year of learning, but a year of playing...

You decide the final outcome (indeed.)
The game has multiple endings. Everything you experience and the choices you make will affect the direction of your story and the final ending.(It will be gradually updated later. )

Tell me your suggestion (must be!)
If you find any problems during the game or have any suggestions for modifying the plot, please get the method of contacting me in the "description" column of the game and tell me.

The intertwining of timelines, the collision of human nature, do you do your best or let it go?
When the timeline changes, is it to maintain the status quo or return to the original?
Kindness is not always right, but it is at least innocent.
What is truth depends on your choice.
Hey there! Are you ready? The game is about to begin!
